election_record.label: South Carolina 1811 House of Representatives, Clarendon District, Special

overview.note: This election was held to replace John Peter Richardson, who died on January 11, 1811.

sub_unit.name: Charles Conner's Store
sub_unit.note: "Names of voters at Charles Conner's Store, 29th April 1811." List has the names of 123 persons.

sub_unit.name: Clarendon Court House
sub_unit.note: List has names of 121 persons plus Claudious Rechbourg and Joseph Gallenchat, who may have been the managers. Their names are not among the 121 in the voter list and probably they also voted, so the total for the court house is 123 persons.

sub_unit.name: Fork of Black River
sub_unit.note: "A list of the votes taken in the Fork of Black River on the 29th and 30th of April 1811." List has the names of 60 persons.

election_record.reference: Original Election Returns. South Carolina Department of Archives and History, Columbia.
